title: Warrior
description: The story of Gan Moondark of the Dog People and the nation he forged in the post-apocalyptic Northwest.For centuries the proud Dog People had roamed with their horses across the grassy plains and fir-clad hills of the Northwest. Then, when their strength was as its greatest, the Dogs turned their bows on one another in a struggle over who would become War Chief after Col Moondark.....
author: Donald E. McQuinn
